verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu saba hastī ghucāila
nija-gaṇe ratha-kāchi ṭānibāre dila

synonyms: tabe—at that time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saba—all; hastī—the elephants; ghucāila—let free; nija-gaṇe—to His own men; ratha-kāchi—the rope of the car; ṭānibāre dila—gave to pull.
translation: At that time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu let all the elephants go free and placed the car's ropes in the hands of His own men.
